SEARCH
Package uk.pallas.systems.typr.entities.v1.validation

Interface StringValidationRule

All Superinterfaces:
ValidationRule
public interface StringValidationRule extends ValidationRule
Defines regular expression rules for a field to confirm if the field is valid or not.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String
    getDetectRegex()
    The regular Expression to apply to a string defined by this field definition, to confirm a given string is valid.
    String
    getExtractRegex()
    The regular Expression to extract a matching regex string from a text block.
    boolean
    isValid(String toTest)
    Is the supplied test object something that matches against our field definition regular expression?
    void
    setDetectRegex(String validation)
    The regular Expression to apply to a string defined by this field definition, to confirm a given string is valid.
    void
    setExtractRegex(String validation)
    Allows us to set the regular expression to extract the term from a text block.

    Methods inherited from interface uk.pallas.systems.typr.entities.v1.validation.ValidationRule

    getDescription, isValid, setDescription

  • Method Details

    • getDetectRegex

      String getDetectRegex()
      The regular Expression to apply to a string defined by this field definition, to confirm a given string is valid.
      Returns:
      non-null regular expression that can be used by Java Regex system.

    • setDetectRegex

      void setDetectRegex(String validation)
      The regular Expression to apply to a string defined by this field definition, to confirm a given string is valid.
      Parameters:
      validation - a valid regular expression string.

    • getExtractRegex

      String getExtractRegex()
      The regular Expression to extract a matching regex string from a text block.
      Returns:
      non null regular expression that can be used by Java Regex system.

    • setExtractRegex

      void setExtractRegex(String validation)
      Allows us to set the regular expression to extract the term from a text block.
      Parameters:
      validation - a valid regular expression string.

    • isValid

      boolean isValid(String toTest)
      Is the supplied test object something that matches against our field definition regular expression?

      If validation optional is set to true this will return true, if the supplied object is null, this will always return false. Otherwise it will call matches on the supplied string.

      Parameters:
      toTest - to test is valid
      Returns:
      false if the object fails the validation match.
